name: Peek-a-Boo!
overview:
Peek-a-Boo! was produced by Jaleco in 1993.

An Arkanoid-style game.

The goal is to clear each level of all the bricks on the screen. Once cleared, you get a reward in the form of a picture of a woman or man in various stages of undress. The more levels you clear, the more you get to see.

Move a paddle left and right to prevent a bouncing ball from escaping the screen at the bottom. Use the ball to remove a pattern of bricks. Once all bricks are gone, you get a reward and advance a level.
